text: Right now we're very much in legacy mode. The vids don't match up with the interface, but if you have rudimentary skills with the tools, it's an easy task. In the future, this cert will be replaced with one more geared towards developers that will require more in-depth understanding of things like custom modules, HubL, and HubDB (along with in-depth training on that stuff)
Thanks for the updates <@U3PKJ8EQL> & <@U22PKFRU5> - I’ll go through them as they are and if there’s a major update to the cert course, I’ll just re-take
